summary:
Krav Maga is a self-defense system from Israel, created by Imi Lichtenfeld. It combines techniques from various martial arts like Aikido, Boxing, Judo, Karate, and Wrestling. The focus is on practical, real-life situations.

Lichtenfeld developed Krav Maga after using his boxing and wrestling skills to protect Jewish neighborhoods in Slovakia. He later taught it to the Israeli military (IDF) and it became their official combat system. Krav Maga is known for its aggressive and quick techniques, teaching both defense and offense. It's used by Israeli special forces and has variations for civilians and security forces.
title: Krav Maga
